article.headline: Assault at 40th and Spruce prompts Sunday evening UPennAlert
article.abstract: The suspect is a man wearing dark clothing who was last seen heading westbound on Spruce Street towards 41st Street.
article.content:
An assault at the 4000 block of Spruce Street prompted a UPennAlert Sunday evening.

According to the Department of Public Safety's website, the suspect is a man wearing dark clothing who was last seen heading westbound on Spruce Street towards 41st Street.

According to the alert sent at 9:41 p.m., police advise students to use caution and avoid the area.

DPS issued an all-clear at 10:05 p.m, stating that it is safe to resume normal activity, but that police and security officers are patrolling the area. 

This is a developing story that was last updated at 10:47pm. Please check back here for updates.

dominantMedia.title: Penn Police Tape 40th St.jpeg
dominantMedia.content: The assault occurred at the 4000 block of Spruce Street.
